explains: n. 天盖；检验器；试验员
wordGroup: hardness tester 硬度试验机；硬度测定仪
strength tester 强度测试机；强力试验机
impact tester 冲击试验机；撞撃试验机；冲辉验机
rockwell hardness tester 洛氏硬度试验机
tensile tester 拉力试验机；抗张强度测定仪
vickers hardness tester 维克氏硬度试验计

sentences.en: I have a battery tester in my garage.
sentences.cn: 我的车库里有台电池测试仪。

sentences.en: A software tester, on the other hand, their entire goal is to look at this product and find problems with it, to improve it.
sentences.cn: 另一方面，软件测试人员的整个目标是观察这一产品并发现它的问题，从而改进它。
